import'./App.css';import Navbar from'./components/Navbar';import TextForm from'./components/TextForm';import About from'./components/About';import{useState}from'react';import Alert from'./components/Alert';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[mode,setMode]=useState('light');// Whether dark mode is enabled or not
